name: Fragments of light (IncogKneeToe)
description:
The game is completely  in the dark, except for the lightball hovering in your hand and the balls thrown by enemies.

USE YOUR LIGHTBALL:
to block incomming enemy balls
to disable enemies for 20 seconds 
as a lightsource

CONTROLS
A - move left
D - move right
SPACE - jump (hold to jump higher)
LEFT_MOUSE - (throw your lightball / freeze lightball after throw / respawn ball back in hand, you can also do that by running into your lightball)

There a total of 10 light emitting fragments on the map and you have to find all of them.
Everytime you collect a new fragment, that one will become your new checkpoint. When you lose you will get the option to restart or respawn on your last collected fragment. You will keep the ones you collected when you respawn on a checkpoint.

WAYS YOU CAN LOSE:
Landing on a spike 
Getting hit by a ball that has been spit out by an enemy
